Stargazer Data API
Table of Contents

Interface IUserUpdateReceiver

Namespace
Stargazer
Assembly
New Game Project.dll

Can be used to indicate that a class is capable of receiving the UserPositionUpdated notification. Is not currently used due to only one class implementing this and then handling individual dispersal of information.

public interface IUserUpdateReceiver

Methods

UpdateUserPosition(CelestialDataPackage<Star>)

Receives the notification

Task UpdateUserPosition(CelestialDataPackage<Star> dataPackage)

Parameters

dataPackage CelestialDataPackage<Star>

The CelestialDataPackage<T> containing the data to be drawn

Returns

Task

A Task that can be awaited.
